form.label: Session Playlog
form.description: Displays commands entered during each session as well as the raw logs from each session

search.query: index=honeypot cmd=* | table host | dedup host

index=honeypot host=$sensor$| iplocation prefix=iploc_ allfields=true src_ip | eval src_ip_Country = if(isnull(iploc_Country),"Unknown",iploc_Country) | eval session_hash = src_ip.session_id.host | eval session_hash = md5(session_hash)| stats earliest(_time) as Time, values(src_ip) AS "Attacker IP", values(src_ip_Country) AS "Attacker Country", values(host) as "Sensor", count(cmd) as msgcount by session_hash | where msgcount > 0 | eval Time=strftime(Time,"%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S") | rename session_hash AS "Session ID", msgcount AS "Message Count" | sort - Time
index=honeypot cmd=* | table src_ip | dedup src_ip | sort + src_ip
index=honeypot cmd=* src_ip=$ipaddress$ | table session_hash | dedup session_hash | sort - session_hash

index=honeypot cmd=* src_ip=$ipaddress$ session_hash=$field2$ | stats values(cmd) AS "Command Entered", by _time, session_hash | table "Command Entered", _time | rename _time AS "Time" | eval Time=strftime(Time,"%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S") | sort - "Time"
